amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to diligent efforts, guide searches, recommend practices, imitations on injunctive relief, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5669 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5669 proposed by Senator Whitehouse for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S9867-9872; text: CR S9870) To modify provisions relating to diligent efforts, guide searches, recommend practices, imitations on injunctive relief, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5669 proposed by Senator Whitehouse for Senator Kyl.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5669 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
